TopicTitle: ASET Props Pack. v1.5 (for the modders who create IVA)

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 7 hours ago, Tegmil said:
> 
> 
> Just drop the contents in GameData on top of your ASET install.
> 

If you do replace these textures in ASET, please be aware that 1) if an RPM update is released that fixes the other bugs in KSP 1.8, you will have to re-install the original textures for ASET, and 2) the textures will be upside down for any MAS mods that uses them.
Is this compatible with 1.9.0?

> 
> 
> 45 minutes ago, EasyAce said:
> 
> 
> Is this compatible with 1.9.0?
> 

seems to me it is working based on initial testing with RPM

I am loving the enhanced IVA experience, I certainly hope that these features (or similar features) will be present in KSP2. 

Though, I have been having trouble getting my mods to work correctly as of the date of this post (March 6, 2020), KSP version 1.9.1.

My KSP GameData file is listed below:

ClickThroughBlocker

ToolbarControl

ASET (Props and Avionics)

ALCOR IVA

Astrogator

Chatterer

DE\_IVAExtension

EngineIgnitor

EngineLight

GravityTurn

HullCameraVDS

Indicator Lights

IVA\_ASET\_MAKINGHISTORY

JSI

<abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr>

KerbalEngineer

Kerbulator

Kermantech

kOS

kPM

MechJeb2

MK1-2\_IVA\_Replacement\_by\_ASET

NavInstruments

NavUtil

NavyFish

SCANsat

TAC Life Support

ULTIMATE\_SHUTTLE\_IVA

VesselView

WorldStablizer

The problem I am having is best illustrated by the screenshots below:

[https://imgur.com/zMdAh3M](https://imgur.com/zMdAh3M)

[https://imgur.com/CpLi4De](https://imgur.com/CpLi4De)

In these screenshots, the RPM (monitors) are not responsive, they essentially don't respond to any clicking. Moreover, there are panels missing from the primary dashboard.

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

[@HDSpanky](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/203179-hdspanky/) not exactly what your problem is, but I know that specifically, the ALCOR and MK1-2\_IVA\_Replacement\_by\_ASET IVAs are supposed to be subfolders of /ASET/ ... If those are the speciifc IVAs youre having issues with? vOv  

EDIT: ahh yeah... actually \*looked\* at your images, and see they are both ALCOR-specific...  

Yeah, try moving both the above folders into the /ASET/ folder, and try that

I downloaded these mods seemingly correctly a few weeks ago

ASET Props

ASET Avionics

RPM

Module manager

DE\_IVA Extension

and the outcome for the IVA was: everything except the the screens don't work, and the alarms, buttons, and switches don't have their specific text. Also more recently I had the Near Future Spacecraft Parts mod.The screens still don't work. While the knobs and some buttons work, they don't make any sound or do any animation. I will be grateful for help.

![150295CA249D57750C43AE40DECB686C8C79162A](https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1021697128195633774/150295CA249D57750C43AE40DECB686C8C79162A/)

I think I found the problem: I had way too many mods installed 

I think KSP loading would load ASET incorrectly

Hi!  

i seem to be having an issue with the RPM HUD you get in the stock fliers and was wondering if anyone has replaced them with the ASET ones? (the ASET HUD is so much better and cooler)  

unless someone can explain to me how to replace it myself but i'm a bit slow and feel uncomfortable messing around with IVAs x.x

I made this for Tantares, but i need help updating it for newer versions than 1.6.1... also some bug resolving would be appreciated. ![BXvMwGe.png](https://i.imgur.com/BXvMwGe.png)

[https://github.com/Fredde104/Tantares-Soyuz-with-RPM-and-ASET](https://github.com/Fredde104/Tantares-Soyuz-with-RPM-and-ASET)

I'm getting a weird visual glitch/bug in that the font seems to be missing. I put it into github issues [here](https://github.com/Alexustas/ASET_Props/issues/2).  

I will copy and paste the text here for reference and to have it searchable in the forums.

I'm using DemonEin's IVA pack. I get graphical glitches on linux. Mostly the font becomes large, white blocks on all of the displays which are not the RPM MFDs. The unlit indicators look fine, but when they light up, the font becomes garbage. Most of the other indicators are unreadable.  

I'm running Ubuntu 20.04 LTS and am using ASET from <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> and the latest KSP from steam (1.9.1)

- RPM from <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> v0.31.3  

- ASET Prop Pack from <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> v1.5  

- Click Through Blocker from Git v0.1.9.5  

- Toolbar Controller 1.8.0-0.1.9.4 from git (whatever that means)  

- Module manager from <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">ckan</abbr> v4.1.3  

- A bunch of unrelated stuff

![82727735-97ba3800-9cec-11ea-8a38-45175e1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16250196/82727735-97ba3800-9cec-11ea-8a38-45175e108b56.png)

When I turn on the lights it gets worse.  

I'd much appreciate a solution or fix.

I'm moving this from [https://github.com/DemonEin/DE_IVAExtension/issues/1#issue-623623693](https://github.com/DemonEin/DE_IVAExtension/issues/1#issue-623623693) because I figured it's probably an ASET problem.

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, FalcoGer said:
> 
> 
> I'm moving this from [https://github.com/DemonEin/DE_IVAExtension/issues/1#issue-623623693](https://github.com/DemonEin/DE_IVAExtension/issues/1#issue-623623693) because I figured it's probably an ASET problem.
> 

That looks like a shader issue with the text renderer code in RasterPropMonitor.  You might check on the RPM (adopted) thread to see if [@JonnyOThan](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/40902-jonnyothan/) knows about it.

<iframe allowfullscreen="" data-controller="core.front.core.autosizeiframe" data-embedauthorid="40902" data-embedcontent="" data-embedid="embed8823244761" scrolling="no" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/190737-18x-19x-rasterpropmonitor-adopted/&do=embed" style="height:211px;max-width:502px;"></iframe>

Quick bug report: I was trying to fly an all IVA mission, so I was trying to use the lat/lon readouts to help navigate, but they only got me confused until I realized the cardinal directions were wrong. I asked in the RPM thread, and Manul found the problem to be a cfg file from ASET.

> 
> 
> On 5/23/2020 at 2:18 AM, Manul said:
> 
> 
> UPD: yes, it's not RPM error, just a wrong letter in MFD page config.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Changed this LON:[#FFFF00FF]{0:DMSdd+mm+ss+N}  to this LON:[#FFFF00FF]{0:DMSdd+mm+ss+E} in ALCORAscDes40x20.txt  and longitude is E and W now, not S and N
> 

So, I opened ALCORAscDes40x20.txt and changed it to this:

> 
> 
> Quote
> 
> 
> [#FFFFFFFF]LAT:[#FFFF00FF]{0:DMSdd+mm+ss+N}{2:;"                                        ";""} [#FFFFFF44]T.LAT:[#FFFF0044]{1:DMSdd+mm+ss+E}    $&$LATITUDE LATITUDETGT TARGETEXISTS  
> 
> [#FFFFFFFF]LON:[#FFFF00FF]{0:DMSdd+mm+ss+E}{2:;"                                        ";""} [#FFFFFF44]T.LON:[#FFFF0044]{1:DMSdd+mm+ss+N}    $&$ LONGITUDE  LONGITUDETGT TARGETEXISTS
> 

That fixed the problem.

hello ! big thanks for these wonderfull PROPS, it's fantastic and cool ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

![mlbHKxj.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/mlbHKxj.jpg)

a few hour to install these lovely bags, because the UVmap in blender are mirored Y , i spent  hour to find why my bag was not correctly oriented in ksp, giving false information to have a good quaternion in blender....... no unity at this time, a good chalenge lol

Some Prop instrument added on left and right off the DE\_IVA mod, need a better control of <abbr title="Thrust-to-weight ratio">twr</abbr> for fine ajustement

added on right THRUST\_limiter, with GIMBAL and TOGGLE motor ON, on the left a new primitive made in blender, Primitive\_speciale\_Beveled with two switch Delete\_NODE and Delete\_TArget.

**EDIT 5/9/2020**

hi !, today i have tested the PROP in **folders InternalLights** and **InternalLightBox01**

the prop don't work there are no illumination in cockpit .

EX : this prop : **InternalOmniLight\_1m-CP01** do nothing !

    // Cockpit omni first group. Range 1m
    
    PROP
    {
      name = IntOmniLight_1m-CP01
      MODULE{	name = JSIVariableAnimator	refreshRate = 5		VARIABLESET		{			animationName = InternalOmniLightAnim		variableName = MATH_COCKPITLIGHT_BRIGHTNESS_01		scale = 0,10	}}
    }

 question : they need a specific SWITCH to work or not .

this prop : **InternalLightBox01** don't work too, no light with internal cokpit light on for example

    PROP
    {
      name = InternalLightBox01
      
    MODULE{	name = JSIActionGroupSwitch	animationName = IntLightBoxAnim	perPodPersistenceName = TurnInternalCockpitLights	actionName = dummy	switchSound = ASET/ASET_Props/Sounds/beep-21	switchSoundVolume = 0.01}
    
    }

thk !

**Edited <time datetime="2020-09-25T16:42:13Z" title="09/25/2020 04:42  PM" data-short="3 yr">September 25, 2020</time> by stephm**
  
InternalLights and InternalLightBox01 folder

I don't know if this has been reported before, but I'm using the props through DE\_IVA Extrension, and have noticed a couple of issues with camera feeds on the standard MFD:

- The regular external feed (and I think flight view) treats symmetrically mounted cameras as a single one, so it doesn't let you switch between cams of a single "combo".
- The landing feed uses the first camera mounted, and the NEXT/PREV arrows don't work to change the view to other cameras. Even if they are different combos.

Yes, I think they DO need specific switches for specific lights... I am working on an IVA, and am also having the same problem with the ASET Light props. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

My final MK3 IVA internal based on DE_IVAExtension-v.1.0.2 and ASET_Props-1.5 | | | --- | Sorry for the quality i have a bad internet ! A long battle with Blender 2.90 and UNITY 2019 ![:lol:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_laugh.png ":lol:"), i can export a part Internal with blender but there are bug with kerbal camera and WindowFocusPoint don't work in ksp i'm searching for that. in spite of my problem with the last Unity part tool, for this IVA i used the previous version of Part tool and it's ok However I still have this problem with the windows languages forced to switch to English for Region and Format regional, on a french install Otherwise part tool import and export don't work ! I do not want to create too much, I'm not the time, however I still created a foot rest and a modified version of the seat ksp at the belt suitable for the seat ASET . changed the material of the Ivashell to simple bump specular without ligthmap. for a complete dark iva when the lights are set to off. Added a full mechjeb control panel for auto pilot it's on the right side inspired by the work of Alexustas ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:"). steph ! edit : I look at the quote of the pod MK1 now with the same mindset. i hope the translator worked fine ...... **Edited November 6, 2020 by stephm**
